Articles.Content:

PC has 16 G ram so i dont think that is a problem here. Help lps

The amount of RAM isn't really important, KSP on Windows and OSX is a 32-bit application so is limited to less than 4GB of address space. I'd give long odds that you're hitting that limit, if you upload your logs somewhere we can check and be sure.

23 minutes ago, Red Iron Crown said:

The amount of RAM isn't really important, KSP on Windows and OSX is a 32-bit application so is limited to less than 4GB of address space. I'd give long odds that you're hitting that limit, if you upload your logs somewhere we can check and be sure.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ra30mqf2vh0boik/output_log.txt?dl=0 here is the Output_log

Quote

DynamicHeapAllocator out of memory - Could not get memory for large allocationDynamicHeapAllocator out of memory - Could not get memory for large allocationCould not allocate memory: System out of memory!

Yup, running out of address space. Try removing some mods, switching to OpenGl (if you haven't already), or using this mod to reduce your memory footprint: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/128660-1051-63-dec-31-2015-dynamic-texture-loader/
